# User Story Template

**Title:**
As a [user role], I want [feature/goal], so that [reason/business value].

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. [Criteria 1]
2. [Criteria 2]
3. [Criteria 3]

**Priority:** [High/Medium/Low]
**Story Points:** [Estimated Effort in Points]
**Notes:**
- [Additional information or edge cases]
